categories.noProjects: No projects in this category yet.
categories.checkOtherCategories: Check other categories or come back later.

trending.noProjectFound: Nenhum projeto encontrado para este período.

banner.description: Discover and support the best new tech products.

auth.signInToContinue: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.enterEmailToReset: Enter your email to reset your password
auth.resetEmailSent: If an account exists for {email}, you will receive a password reset email shortly.
auth.agreeToTerms: By clicking continue, you agree to our
auth.nameRule: Name must be at least 2 characters
auth.emailRule: Please enter a valid email address
auth.passwordRule: Password must be at least 8 characters
auth.passwordUppercaseRule: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
auth.passwordLowercaseRule: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
auth.passwordNumberRule: Password must contain at least one number
auth.resetPasswordError: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
auth.resetPasswordSuccess: Password reset successful. Please sign in.

verifyEmail.title: Check your email
verifyEmail.description: We've sent you a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
verifyEmail.expireMessage: The verification link will expire in 24 hours. If you don't see the email, you can request a new one.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Welcome to Open Launch. These Terms of Service govern your use of our platform, which focuses on discovering and supporting projects.
introduction.paragraph2: By using Open Launch, you agree to these terms. If you don't agree, please don't use our services.

ageRequirements.title: Age Requirements:
ageRequirements.description: You must be at least 13 years old to use Open Launch.

accountResponsibility.title: Account Responsibility:
accountResponsibility.description: If you create an account, you're responsible for maintaining its security and for all activities under your account.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use:
acceptableUse.description: When using Open Launch, you agree not to:

items.illegalContent: Post content that's illegal, harmful, or violates others' rights
items.misrepresentation: Misrepresent yourself or your affiliation with others
items.interference: Interfere with the platform's operation or security
items.unauthorizedCommercial: Use the service for unauthorized commercial purposes

content.title: 3. Content
content.yourContentDescription: When you submit projects, comments, or other content on Open Launch, you retain ownership, but grant us permission to display and use that content on our platform.
content.responsibilityDescription: You're responsible for the content you submit. Make sure you have the right to share it and that it doesn't violate any laws or these terms.
content.ourRightsDescription: We can remove any content at our discretion if we believe it violates these terms or might harm our platform, users, or third parties.

intellectualProperty.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description1: Open Launch is an open source project licensed under the MIT License. The source code is available on
intellectualProperty.description2: While the core platform is open source, certain features or services may be proprietary. The MIT License allows you to:

list.use: Use, copy, and modify the software

intellectualProperty.description3: You must include the original copyright notice and license in any substantial portions of the software.
intellectualProperty.description4: User-submitted content remains the property of the respective users, who grant Open Launch a license to display and use that content on our platform.

thirdPartyContent.title: 5. Third-Party Content
thirdPartyContent.description1: Open Launch may contain links to third-party websites or services, including projects. We're not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of these third parties.
thirdPartyContent.description2: Your interactions with third-party services are between you and that third party.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.description1: We can suspend or terminate your access to Open Launch at any time for any reason, particularly if you violate these terms.
termination.description2: If your account is terminated, you'll no longer have access to your content or account information.

disclaimers.title: 7. Disclaimers
disclaimers.description1: Open Launch is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We don't guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
disclaimers.description2: We're not responsible for the accuracy or reliability of any content posted by users or third parties.

limitationOfLiability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: To the extent permitted by law, Open Launch and its team will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from your use of or inability to use our service.

changesToTerms.title: 9. Changes to These Terms
changesToTerms.description1: We may update these terms from time to time. We'll notify you of significant changes, but it's your responsibility to review these terms periodically.
changesToTerms.description2: Your continued use of Open Launch after changes means you accept the updated terms.

contactUs.title: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.description1: If you have questions about these terms, please contact us at:

pricing.title: Choose Your Launch Plan
pricing.description: Get the visibility your project deserves with our flexible launch options. All launches happen at 8:00 AM UTC.

freeLaunch.title: Free Launch
freeLaunch.description: Standard launch with up to {days} days scheduling window.

premiumLaunch.title: Premium Launch
premiumLaunch.description: Priority scheduling with faster launch dates.

features.queue: Skip the Free Queue - Priority access

premiumPlusLaunch.title: Premium Plus
premiumPlusLaunch.description: Ultimate visibility with special homepage spot

features.highlight: Premium Spotlight Placement: Most visible position on our platform
features.slots: Exclusive Daily Spots: Only {slots} projects per day
features.earlyDates: Fastest Launch Dates: Top priority for your project
features.backlink: Guaranteed Dofollow Backlink: Valuable SEO boost for your site

question1.title: When do launches happen?
question1.content: All launches happen at 8:00 AM UTC. We launch a limited number of projects each day to ensure quality visibility.

question2.title: How many projects are launched each day?
question2.content: We launch up to {free} free projects, {premium} premium projects, and {premiumPlus} premium plus projects daily.

question3.title: How far in advance can I schedule my launch?
question3.content: Free users can schedule up to {freeDays} days in advance, Premium users up to {premiumDays} days, and Premium Plus users up to {premiumPlusDays} days.
